summary: REQ-12 appears implemented by forcing `next-themes` to `light` across all App render branches (normal, loading, payment success/failure), and by ensuring the body uses `bg-background`. REQ-13 is only partially evidenced: the Header brand pill/button background was changed to a light surface, but there is no direct diff evidence that the Hero intro text container background was updated to a light/white fill. The diff summary also indicates multiple unrequested content/layout changes beyond the stated non-goals.
